评论详情: I like the feel. The fit too. What I am disappointed in is the way the black from the bows bleeds into the white of the sweater. I say bleeds….the black yarn from the underneath side shows thru the white. It’s not enough to return. I wore it and quite liked it. Just not perfect. So 4 stars.
Great top, wears well, not to thick or heavy!

I was so excited to receivethis sweater. It took forever to arrive, and when it finally did, the quality of the sweater material itself felt a little cheap to me. On top of that, all of the bow accents are very poorly placed. The sweater looks fine from far away. But up close, you can see that the bows are very sloppily placed and there’s some bleeding of the black color around the bows. I’m so disappointed. I was really looking forward to wearing this sweater but ultimately will be returning it.
This sweater is good quality. Fix true to size. I can wear this anything
Was disappointed in the size (lg)for the price point. Size light was too tight. Delivery of the item was unprofessional.
It was beautiful gift for friend
Love it when the product I order is just as expected. The size, color and softness were spot on. So I’m very happy with it.
That material on this sweater is not good and it was extremely scratchy. I do not recommend.
So cute and good quality, wished I would have upsized only to make it loose fit but it is accurate to size
Wanted to love this but too itchy to keep
Nice product for a fair price
Bought this in XS for a Christmas gift.  She loved it.  great sweater for the price.
Love this sweater. The color is so pretty. It’s so soft and true size.
Fit true to size. Color bright and as expected. I ordered the hot pink and have gotten so many compliments. Soft, not itchy. So far no shedding or pilling. Very pleased
Beautiful but the application stitching showed thru the front. Returning it.
Very stylish and well made. Based on the size chart it would have been a large. But I ended up getting the medium and it fit well. Not too tight or too loose.

I love the look, feel, and fit of this sweater! It was the perfect sweater to throw on for a fun, yet subtle holiday festive look. It was nice not to overthink what I was going to wear and just throw this cutie on.

The fabric is soft enough. The color is lighter and pinker than the Burgundy shown, which I do not like. My real issue with this sweater is the cut and sizing. The sweater is cut much shorter than shown in the product photos, so it doesn't even partially cover my butt. I used the size chart provided and sized up based on the measurements, hoping for a looser fit.  I'm 5'2. The size chart measurements indicated that I should order a small, but I ordered a medium, hoping for a looser fit. I'm glad I ordered the medium, because this sweater runs smaller than their size chart indicates. I wanted to wear this for Christmas dinner, but I'll return it and find something else. This style is not flattering on me... very boxy.
The quality of this product was terrible! There was not a tag for item. Item was definitely a return from someone else. Oddly sized!
The material is not soft, very in polyester
This sweater great deal and soft
This is a lovely sweater. It is a medium, but it runs big. I could've gone with a small. I got so many compliments on this pretty sweater. It's sure to be a winner in your wardrobe!
Fits really cute and very classy and modest with a splash of style! Hoping it washes well but for now I’m really happy 😊 Thank you
I love this bow sweater it is soft and comfortable . I love anything with bows so I was so excited for this to come in.
Liked the popular style, the colors, and the cozy feel .

This item was too small and very poor quality.  They do not reimburse for return fees and there is no warning under the description item that you will have to cover the return cost.  This is very misleading and poor customer service.  Third party seller. Very dissatisfied.
